data.title: The Butchart Gardens – Victoria, Canada – Hours
data.meta_description: Whenever you’re planning to visit, The Gardens offer unforgettable experiences year-round—and from dawn to dusk (and beyond!)
data.text:
The Gardens are open year round, these hours reflect admission gate times.

The Gardens are open for viewing one hour after the gate closes. The Dining Room, The Blue Poppy Restaurant, Coffee Shop, and Seed & Gift Store hours.

Hours are subject to change without notice, please continue to check back for the most up to date information.

Summer 2024

June 1–September 15

Monday - Tuesday 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Wednesday - Sunday 9:00 AM - 10:00 PM

September 16–September 30

Monday - Sunday 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Autumn 2024

October 1–October 31

Monday - Sunday 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM

November 1–November 30

Monday - Sunday 9:00 AM - 3:30 PM

Christmas 2024

December 1–December 24

Monday - Sunday 3:00 PM - 9:00 PM

December 25

Closed

December 26–January 6

Monday - Sunday 3:00 PM - 9:00 PM

Winter 2025

January 7–January 19

Monday - Sunday 9:00 AM - 3:30 PM

January 20–February 2

Monday - Sunday Closed

February 3–February 28

Monday - Sunday 9:00 AM - 3:30 PM

March 1–March 31

Monday - Sunday 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM

Spring 2025

April 1–May 31

Monday - Sunday 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

The Garden Awaits

Ready to plan your visit to The Gardens? Buy your tickets? Start your journey here.

What Visitors Are Saying

“I have been coming here for years and it never gets old.”

“Best place in Canada by far.”

“Looks like Monet’s paintings when raining, especially in the Sunken Garden!”

“A modern day Garden of Eden! Fabulous!”

“Stunning – satisfied the soul.”
